Title: 'Till I Make it on My Own
Plot: Picking up where we left off last season, Riley and Kyle are mid confrontation and find themselves interrupted by local cop, Nathan. His presence is not a welcome one, but the purpose of his visit is for a reason that neither of them could have imagined. At the spa, Riley inherits a new client, Judge Overton aka ?Mr. Louboutin,? whose love for expensive shoes rivals her own.
